node.display_long_description:
Now optimized for Quest 2... What an excellent day for an exorcism!

Described as one of the most disturbing experiences available for virtual reality, The Exorcist: Legion delivers FIVE unique stories and features a variety of demonic entities, exorcism tools, hidden artifacts and atmospheric locations. Delve deep into the heart of the supernatural as you learn the trade of demonic exorcism and uncover secrets leading you towards a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. Are you brave enough?

The Exorcist: Legion is part action, part mystery, part puzzle-solving... and ALL terror.

Cross-buy enabled!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Overview:

Massive texture update, improved resolution, shaders and lighting
Quest 2 90hz update
New animations, texture effects and scaled resolution on all demons
Improved physics interactions and ported in the PC version of the Torch in Chapter 5
Out of bounds now resets position after countdown
Various bug fixes and quality of life updates

Details: 

Rendering update:

Increased texture resolution throughout
Improved lighting throughout
Various updates to shaders and particles
Various animation and art improvements
Improved readability of ingame documents

Out of bounds System:
Player position is now reset to a safe position if out of the play area for over 5 seconds
Countdown and UI to explain repositioning

Physics:
90hz physics refresh for Quest 2 users to smooth all interactions and movements
Improved interaction pickup and release
General locomotion improvements
Smooth crouching improvements

Development:
Move forwards, backwards and diagonally while the menu is open - Strafe is blocked due to menu interactions.
Improved memory management
General teleport improvements: player no longer has to look directly down at the floor to teleport.

Fixes:
Add fail-safes for the cross occasionally disconnecting from the kit and becoming unusable.
Bug where hands would sometimes get stuck in the hover state and the player would not be able to make a fist.
General fixes and additional rules to catch any potential issues

nodes.title: Quest 2 Major Graphics Update + 90hz support!
nodes.body_text:
Quest 2 Update

- Massive texture update, improved resolution, shaders and lighting
- 90hz update
- New animations, texture effects and scaled resolution on all demons
- Improved physics interactions and ported in the PC version of the Torch in Chapter 5
- Out of bounds now resets position after countdown
- Various bug fixes and quality of life updates

node.reviewDescription:
This game compared to PC or even PSVR had a huge graphics downgrade, even though it keep the same atmosphere, the graphics on Oculus Quest 2 deserves better...the texture are bright, flat-rendered,  with NO lighting (no shading) no reflection, the 3d models are super low-poly...the whole experience , made exception for the first chapter (that is almost close to the original one) is really terrible such as the last chapter , that one in the cave, where this game is at its worst, graphically speaking, the rocks are really low poly and the textures are basically inexistent, the whole terrain and cave walls are mono-color without no shades, and you even removed the torch fire, the little fireplace at the beginning and be able to interact with natural elements... 

For developers: i LOVE this game and the gameplay is super ok...PLEASE update texture , 3d models and illumination light for Oculus Quest 2 and you gonna get 5 stars...

Update march 2021: forget everything i said above...after a massive 1.46Gb update , The Exorcist for Quest 2  is at its best!! now can compete with PC and PSVR version!! for me it's now the best VR version ever...5 stars without any doubt!!

developerResponse.body: Blackcat, we're so glad you appreciated the update and upgrades.  Thank you for the 5 stars!

website_page_meta.description: The Exorcist: Legion is an acclaimed horror game set in the Academy Award-winning franchise of The Exorcist. Delve deep into the heart of the supernatural as you learn the ancient trade of demonic exorcism and uncover a supernatural conspiracy.
website_page_meta.title: The Exorcist: Legion VR · Oculus Quest
